manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large potted plant on the left near the poster, casting a soft shadow on the floor.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the security officer on the right, filling in the background with the existing wall texture.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background with a bustling city street scene, matching the lighting and perspective.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rain streaks on the windows and reflections on the floor to simulate a downpour.
manipulations.duplication_scale: Duplicate the security officer on the left, scale him down, and place him in the background.
